movie.title: Marshall
movie.plot: The story of Thurgood Marshall, the crusading lawyer who would become the first African-American Supreme Court Justice, as he battles through one of his career-defining cases.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 5 wins & 18 nominations.

events.title: Joseph Spell is acquitted of the rape of Eleanor Strubing
